 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּטַר‎</span> **verb** ==separate, remove, set free== (Late Hebrew ***depart, set free***, Niph\`al also ***die***; Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פטר‎</span> [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>102 a, 2</sup> ***depart (die ?)***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***pa‰âru***</u></abbr>, ***split***, ***break through***, <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ip‰iru***</u></abbr>, ***ransom***, Tel Amarna ***escape, set free*** (perhaps Canaanite); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***cleave, split***, also ***create***; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***create, fabricate***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פְּטַר‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***withdraw, depart)***; — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> [[2Chr.23.8|2Chr 23:8]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּפְטַר‎</span> [[1Sam.19.10|1Sam 19:10]] ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פּוֺטֵר‎</span> [[Prov.17.14|Prov 17:14]] ***passive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּטוּרִים‎</span> [[1Chr.9.33|1Chr 9:33]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] ([[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פטירים‎</span>); construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּטוּרֵי‎</span> [[1Kgs.6.18|1Kgs 6:18]]; [[1Kgs.6.29|1Kgs 6:29]]; [[1Kgs.6.32|1Kgs 6:32]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּטֻרֵי‎</span> v[[1Kgs.6.35|1Kgs 6:35]] — 

**1.** intransitive ***remove*** oneself, specifically ***escape*** [[1Sam.19.10|1Sam 19:10]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִפְּנֵי‎</span>, compare [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]). 

**2.** transitive ***set free*** from duty [[2Chr.23.8|2Chr 23:8]] (accusative of person), so passive [[1Chr.9.33|1Chr 9:33]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] ([[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פטירים‎</span> adjective or Aramaic participle, same meaning); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> [[Prov.17.14|Prov 17:14]] ***set free, let out***; passive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּטוּרֵי צִצִּים‎</span> technical term of ornament in temple, dubious, usually ***out-spread*** (garlands) ***of flowers*** [[1Kgs.6.18|1Kgs 6:18]]; [[1Kgs.6.29|1Kgs 6:29]]; [[1Kgs.6.32|1Kgs 6:32]]; [[1Kgs.6.35|1Kgs 6:35]]. **Hiph\`il** **\*\***compare in Syriac PS<sup>3093</sup>. ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַפְטִירוּ בְשָׂפָה‎</span> [[Ps.22.8|Ps 22:8]] ***they separate with the lip***, i. e. open mouth wide (insultingly).
